title: New: Nsolo – Faith
body:
LA’s **Nsolo** has spent the past couple of years meticulously crafting his impressive sound, and over the course of the past twelve months has really begun to hit his stride with releases.

His latest track, _Faith_, feels heavily indebted to 60’s soul, yet bringing a fresh, unique perspective to it; arguably his finest, most ambitious moment to date. Check it out below.
